name: Be Kind (Mimatix)
description:
Hello, 

This game was created in 3 hours for the Trijam #168 . Sorry if you meet some bugs. 

In this game you have to sort comic book bubbles. Throw the nice ones on the heart and put the less nice ones in the trash. If you hit the hearth with nice word you will gain 2 points, and if you hit the back wall you will gain only 1 point. And remember, be kind to the heart!

Comment if you have any suggestions !

I hope you have fun !

Controls :

Just Drag and Throw.
